section.p: This document provides an overview of the changes in 2.0.3.

ul.li: CVE-2015-7547 - glibc getaddrinfo() stack-based buffer overflow: Linux for HPE Helion has been updated to fix this issue.
CVE-2016-2074 Remote Code Execution attack in OVS: This release includes a fix for this issue.
OpenVSwitch crashing from MPLS packets: This release fixes the issue whereby OpenVSwitch crashes upon receipt of a Multiprotocol Label Switching (MPLS) packet.

Emulex be2net driver: unsuccessful NIC failover: This release addresses a failover issue with the Emulex NIC driver in HPE Linux. When the primary network uplink is removed from the switch, the disconnect carrier signal is not sent to the Emulex driver telling it to switch over to the secondary path.
